content: {A开心}That lost horse came back with an even finer one~! Just like when I lost my talisman, and somehow found a mysterious seed instead.
info: 云果小故事-鱼吃护身符闲聊_云果故事线

content: <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, have you ever heard a story called "The Old Man Who Lost His Horse"? {A失落}It starts with him losin' his horse.

content: Well mah, trouble or blessin', if this is how The Skies Above planned it, I'll go ahead and plant this seed first~!

content: {A歪头}I guess you could call it "Yunguo Who Lost Her Talisman "... <style=SizeSmall>Yeee? Somethin's not right. Feels like the story's not over yet...</style>
